ABOUT ME

Millicent Achieng Odhiambo is a feminist that grew up in Kibera slums. A first born in a family of four girls. Growing up in kibera was a challenge that i had to overcome with self discipline, determination and hard work. I cannot pride myself to be religious or spiritual, but all I know is that I believe in God and Her goodness.
